overview:
As COO Mark Smith is responsible for 3Cinteractive’s day-to-day operations. He has an extensive operational and marketing background in both telecommunications and the online processing industry.

Prior to the start of 3Ci, Smith spent 16 years at MCI. After leaving MCI Smith joined startup Internet Billing Company, one of the first Internet-based payment processing companies, as executive vice president of sales and operations. Smith was instrumental in helping build the company to over 400 employees and processing over a half a billion dollars a year in payments. After the sale of Internet Billing Company in 2002 to Intercept, a publicly traded company in Atlanta, Smith was involved in several new endeavors, including PayVentures, Governmental Management Services, and 365 Billing.
